overview: Steven started building commercial websites in 1996. As a freelancer in Tucson, Arizona, he designed and implemented websites on contract for organizations like IBM, Walbro, Masterduct, and the University of Arizona. Steven started his own web development company called Vizant Group LLC in 2003. While running Vizant Group he built many websites, custom content management systems, inventory management systems, and e-commerce solutions for his clients. Steven graduated from The University of Oklahoma with a bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration.
